oai_dc:dc.dc:title: House at 521 13th Avenue North, c.1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the house at 521 13th Avenue North, c.1950. The area was part of the site of the John Henry Hale Homes (Project Tenn. 5-6). Located in North Nashville, the John Henry Hale Homes were built as public housing for African American tenants in 1953. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
